name: gyro_call_down_02

text: Force me into retirement will they?

name: gyro_rival_01
text: Only enough room in these skies for one lunatic, Bats!
text_simple: only enough room in these skies for one lunatic bats

name: gyro_rival_02
text: Shame you didn't have two crash helmets!
text_simple: shame you didnt have two crash helmets

name: gyro_rival_03
text: And they call me a buzzard!
text_simple: and they call me a buzzard

name: gyro_rival_04
text: Did your arms get tired, Dragon Knight?
text_simple: did your arms get tired dragon knight

name: gyro_rival_05
text: Ah go waste your omens on someone younger.
text_simple: ah go waste your omens on someone younger

name: gyro_rival_06
text: So that's what you were warning me about.
text_simple: so thats what you were warning me about

name: gyro_rival_07
text: Ha! Beat you to it Phoenix!
text_simple: ha beat you to it phoenix

name: gyro_rival_08
text: Those scopes are no match for my view!
text_simple: those scopes are no match for my view

name: gyro_rival_09
text: Too bad Tinker. You're my kind of nut!
text_simple: too bad tinker youre my kind of nut

name: gyro_rival_10
text: All those gears don't work so well with rockets lodged in 'em, huh?
text_simple: all those gears dont work so well with rockets lodged in em huh

text_simple: hey techies next time try launching your explosives

name: gyro_rival_12
text: Next time try launching your explosives!
text_simple: next time try launching your explosives

text: A hundred times my age and you're still a fool!

text: Ah keep your sparks to yourself!
text_simple: ah keep your sparks to yourself

text: Well I suppose that's one way to clear the air.
text_simple: well i suppose thats one way to clear the air

text_simple: your hair gives me the creeps
